sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Create a scheduled job to run time taking Agile fix scripts for Kingston</description> <name>Populate global rank for stories</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var job = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); job.get('name', 'Agile2_Kingston_Upgrade'); SncTriggerSynchronizer.executeNow(job);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-06-15 00:49:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a5a592a693d7320064f572edb67ffb18</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate global rank for stories</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">e919649247403110020ba9f8536d434c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a5a592a693d7320064f572edb67ffb18</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-06-22 21:42:30</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
